short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the background color of your current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply by clicking a button, the background of your current webpage changes to any desired color! How cool is that! (*This was made for educational purposes*)
